conversation.message: Student E, your persistent dedication and absolute confirmation that School C is your definitive first choice have been thoroughly reviewed and are deeply appreciated by our admissions committee. We recognize the outstanding fit between your academic goals and our institution's focus. Given the conclusion of our rigorous selection process and your unwavering commitment, we are delighted to formally offer you admission and finalize our match. Welcome to School C. We look forward to your arrival.

This strongly suggests that the higher priority students (C, B, D) are likely matched elsewhere. Student_E has repeatedly applied (this is the fourth attempt) and confirmed School_C is their first choice, making them a secure and highly desirable match among the remaining options.
